PreceptDef.label: sanguophage
PreceptDef.description:
Our purpose is clear: to seek out the cursed sanguophages wherever they may hide.

Normal Sanguophages will be the focus of this precept.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - All attacks against a Sanguophage will cause extra 10 burn damage.
 - You'll get extra hunt focus precepts with VE Races - Sanguophage and Alpha Genes.
